dataList.name: Ineffable Shape
dataList.desc: When killed in combat, deal 10 SP damage to the unit that attacked it last

dataList.name: Pallidification
dataList.desc: Gana 2 Offense Level and Defense Level for every living Pallidified ally (not counting this unit)

dataList.name: Crashing Filth
dataList.desc: At 10% of Max HP, Inflige 20 SP damage On Hit, Inflige 1 Pallid Noise next turn, then dies.

dataList.name: Spreading Flames
dataList.desc: If there are surviving Pallidified allies at Turn End, all enemies with 20 or more SP lose 1 SP for every surviving Pallidified ally (not counting this unit)

dataList.name: Spreading Flames
dataList.desc: If there are surviving Pallidified allies at Turn End, all enemies with 20 or more SP lose 1 SP for every surviving Pallidified ally (not counting this unit)

dataList.name: Healing Resentment
dataList.desc: If there are surviving Pallidified allies at Turn End, all other Pallidified allies heal (# of other Pallidified allies * 3) HP

dataList.name: Cumulating Organic Material
dataList.desc: Defense Level +1 for every surviving ally (not counting this unit)

dataList.name: Disintegrating Inorganic Material
dataList.desc: Gana 1 Fragile next turn if an ally dies

dataList.name: Intertwined Organic Material
dataList.desc: Offense Level +1 for every surviving ally (not counting this unit)

dataList.name: Scattered Inorganic Material
dataList.desc: Gana 1 Attack Power Down next turn if an ally dies

dataList.name: Organic Breathing
dataList.desc: If this unit dealt the final blow, apply 5 Poise to all Pallidified allies. Apply 1 de Contador de Temple

dataList.name: Organic Hardening
dataList.desc: If this unit dealt the final blow, apply 1 Protection and 2 Defense Level Up to all allies.

dataList.name: Vengeance Tattoo
dataList.desc: Every time a Middle ally is killed in this encounter, gana 1 Nivel Ofensivo Aumentado (Max 5)

dataList.name: Little Vengeance
dataList.desc: Upon Clash Lose, gana 1 Minus Coin Boost next turn (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Multifold Retribution
dataList.desc: Use "Multifold Retribution' at 20% or less HP. (Once per wave)

dataList.name: Chains of Loyalty
dataList.desc: When a Middle ally is killed, gana 1 Plus Coin Boost next turn.

dataList.name: The Big Brother
dataList.desc: All allies heal 10 SP at Turn Start

dataList.name: Chains of Loyalty
dataList.desc: When an ally from the Middle is killed, gana 1 Plus Coin Boost next turn. (Max 2)

dataList.name: Domineer
dataList.desc: If an enemy that attacked this unit fails to deal more than 12 HP damage with their Skill, the enemy loses 10 SP

dataList.name: Brush it Off
dataList.desc: When in panic, recover from panic at the start of the next turn and reset SP to 0.

dataList.name: In the World of Bristly
dataList.desc: Gana 6 Defense Level Down next turn after losing a Clash 3 times
Begins encounter with -20 SP.
